summary: Racemenu preset of Kris Williams from the SyFy channel reality shows ghost hunters and ghost hunters international.
descriptionHtml:
===DESCRIPTION===
This mod is a racemenu preset for the female nord (your character MUST be a female nord) that includes the very close likeness of the lovely and gorgeous Kris Williams from the hit SyFy channel reality shows "ghost hunters" and "ghost hunters international." She is probably the most famous and desirable female cast member of the "ghost hunters" reality television franchise and has been featured in several notable "sexiest 100 women in the world" lists throughout the years and was even once interviewed on playboy radio.

Most people (especially men) would agree that Kris was one of the most stunningly beautiful women on all of reality television, unfortunately she decided to leave the show after ghost hunters international was cancelled in 2012. Which essentially means that millions of heterosexual men will miss seeing her.

[color=#00ff00]===INSTALLATION===
[b]Step 1. After downloading this file, go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and copy and paste the file Kris Williams.jslot into there.

Step 2. Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the
console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen,
and press F9 to load presets and load "Kris Williams.jslot" (it should be
in there) and voila, there you are![/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]===REQUIREMENTS===
*SKSE 1.7.2 or above
*Racemenu (latest version)
*True Eyes
*True Brows
*ApachiiSkyhair[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Make 100% sure that you have the above mods installed before playing this or else this will not work properly!

[b]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2[/b][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation[/color]
author: Kutt
